snippet: In an online video for Mother's Day, Sybrina Fulton, the mother of Trayvon Martin, asks people to join an effort to repeal and prevent passage of Stand Your Ground laws.
abstract: In an online video for Mother's Day, Sybrina Fulton, the mother of Trayvon Martin, asks people to join an effort to repeal and prevent passage of Stand Your Ground laws.

headline.main: Trayvon Martin's Mom Makes a Mother's Day Appeal
